subject: Mandatory monthly Drone Video Recording of Project Highway during the development; construction and O&M period-reg.
text: HRay 775ty TTTANf xfetarrut 414 Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (ss @arv 3 {ToTHTf HATTT4) Yaq/ Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) J@-5 Q 6, Raer-10, ERGT, T fcrit-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/ Miscellaneous/2021 Policy Circular No. 18.69 Dated 1Oth June, 2021 Sub: Mandatory monthly Drone Video Recording of Project   Highway  during the development, construction and O&M period The Contract Agreement on EPC mode (Refer Clause 11.16 of DCA) and the Concession Agreement on HAM & Toll modes (Refer Clause 13.6 of MCA) provide for video recording of the project highway during the construction period. Whether a similar provision exists or not, the instructions in this circular shall be applicable for all projects of NHAI irrespective of mode (Item Rate/EPC / Toll/ Annuity/HAM/OMT /TOT, etc:). 2_ With an objective to bring transparency, uniformity and use latest technologies, drone based video recording   covering the entire ROW showing  chainages, proposed ROW median centreline, etc shall be made by the Contractors/ Concessionaires every month W.e.f. the month ending on 30.06.2021, during construction and O&M period (by approving COS by ROs, if required; for which delegation of power is hereby granted to ROs). NHAI has already finalised zone-wise agencies & rates for the entire country for making drone videos of National Highways. The Contractors/ Concessionaires may use these agencies or engage agency of their choice, but the specifications/methodology should match those notified by NHAI  Contractor/ Concessionaire shall carry out such drone video recording in the presence of Team Leader of IE/AEISC. The video of last month ad the current month running side by side shall be loaded on Data Lake for easily capturing various developments during the month (a sample screenshot is attached herewith and also loaded on Data Lake along with a sample video for guidance). IEZAEISC shall ensure that the features and quality of drone video is acceptable and the video is not distorted/ tampered with: 3 IEIAEISC shall these drone videos and give their comments in its digital MPRs covering interalia but not limited to the encumbrances/ lands not available, sites of COS demands, progress of project mobilisation of plant & equipment, mobilisation at camp sites, progress on rectifications of NCRS, etc alongwith the proposed action plan PD shall crosscheck drone videos during his monthly physical inspections and notify the discrepancies noticed, if any, between drone video, on IEZAEISC comments and ground reality. The discrepancies shall be examined and addressed through joint site inspections_ 4_ In addition, PDs shall undertake drone videography o their own NHAI empanelled agencies on the following specific occassions: on the date of signing of Contract/ Concession Agreement & every month thereafter till declaration of Appointed Date; (ii) whenever Concessionaire/ Contractor notifies IE/ AEISC to undertake the tests claiming completion of the project highway [provisional completion (PCC/PCOD) and completion (CC)], and on date of issue of PCC and CC by IE/AE/SC; and (iii) every month in all developed project reaches where NHAI is responsible for maintenance / O&M Contd. to Pg-2 (HT RT Ri 4T NHAL analyse using IW@
